Dillian Whyte made sure to remind all there are two men headlining at Wembley on April 23 as he explained his media silence ahead of this month's all-British title fight against Tyson Fury.

articles.title: Jim Davidson slammed for women's football joke: 'That isn't very funny' - GB News
articles.description: The comedian made the comment during a debate on whether Northern Ireland boss Kenny Shiels was right to be criticised for saying ‘women are more emotional than men’
articles.content:
Jim Davidson has been slammed for saying hes looking forward to watching women footballers lift their tops up in celebration.
